name: Uprooted (Mango Mob)
description:
Please full screen the game before playing About

The player must use their harpoon-mounted van to uproot and collect trees. Trees can be sold at their lumber mill to earn currency and time. Once time runs out, the game is over. Created for the Global Game Jam 2023.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Controller: 

Steer - Left stick 

Accelerate - Right trigger 

Reverse - Left trigger 

Brakes - B 

Jump - A 

Boost - Y 

Shoot harpoon - RB

------------------------------------------

 Keyboard: 

Steer - A/D 

Accelerate - W 

Accelerate - S 

Brakes - CTRL 

Jump - SPACE 

Boost - L SHIFT 

Shoot harpoon - Left Click

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
